DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Satisfaction With Pharmacist-managed Travel Medicine Clinic
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Travel Health Network , full-service travel medicine clinic locate St. Albert , Alberta . Care provide pharmacist specialized practice travel medicine , authorization prescribe vaccine prescription drug , authorization administer vaccine injection . The study prospective mixed-methods cohort study , describe patient receive care pharmacist-managed travel medicine clinic travel health need , evaluate adherence recommend vaccine oral therapy , satisfaction care provide , health status management health issue arise travel . Chart review elicit descriptive quantitative data related patient ' travel medicine need adherence recommend vaccination oral pharmacotherapy , follow survey contain open-ended qualitative question elicit overall patient satisfaction management health issue encounter travel . Due nature study involve patient present clinic consultation , neither control group blind possible . A convenience sample 100 subject enrol .
